Name: Cumbersome
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.
Review: Interesting and fresh as you like with a pleasant bitterness.
History: Created in 2002 by Shelim Islam at the GE Club, London, England.
